thread.section_title: Days Inn San Francisco International Airport West - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (San Bruno, CA) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Not Great
thread.title_full: Not Great - Review of Days Inn San Francisco International Airport West, San Bruno, CA - TripAdvisor

author: yaxgto
title: Not Great
text: This hotel caused many issues when they held money, while withdrawing money, and charging my card a fake charge. I called the hotel... They said too bad. Finally got the fake charge reversed but they are "reviewing" the rest now after I called Wyndham. I don't know if I will stay at another days inn or Wyndham property again because of this. Plenty of choices. Which is a shame because the hotel was semi decent. Oh well. Customer service should be number one.
